body_html:
I wonder if I can install the latest pytorch version with gcc4.9 (ubuntu14.04 with cuda8.0)？
cmake: relocation error: cmake: symbol _ZNKSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEE7compareERKS4_, version GLIBCXX_3.4.21 not defined in file libstdc++.so.6 with link time reference

Because I had this problem during installing

body:
I wonder if I can install the latest pytorch version with gcc4.9 (ubuntu14.04 with cuda8.0)？
`cmake: relocation error: cmake: symbol _ZNKSt7__cxx1112basic_stringIcSt11char_traitsIcESaIcEE7compareERKS4_, version GLIBCXX_3.4.21 not defined in file libstdc++.so.6 with link time reference`

Because I had this problem during installing
